menstrual.title: Menstrual Phase
menstrual.summary: A natural reset focused on rest, reflection, and restoration.
menstrual.what_is_happening: Hormones are at their lowest, allowing the body to release the previous cycle and conserve energy. This is a time when slowing down supports physical and emotional recovery.

traits.physical: Low energy, need for rest, gentle movement feels best
traits.emotional: More sensitive, craving comfort and quiet

follicular.title: Follicular Phase
follicular.summary: A phase of fresh energy, growth, and new beginnings.
follicular.what_is_happening: Estrogen rises as the body prepares for ovulation. Energy, curiosity, and motivation naturally increase, making this a great time to start new projects.

traits.emotional: Hopeful, inspired, open to new ideas
traits.mental: Creative, focused, good for learning and planning

ovulation.title: Ovulation
ovulation.summary: The most outward-facing and expressive phase of the cycle.
ovulation.what_is_happening: With estrogen at its peak, the body is primed for connection, confidence, and communication. Energy and presence tend to be at their highest.

luteal.title: Luteal Phase
luteal.summary: A gradual shift inward toward completion and self-care.
luteal.what_is_happening: Progesterone rises and then slowly falls if pregnancy does not occur. The body begins to slow down, signaling a need for boundaries, nourishment, and closure.

traits.physical: Slowing energy, cravings, need for grounding routines
traits.emotional: More inward, easily overstimulated, craving calm
traits.mental: Detail-oriented, reflective, focused on finishing tasks
